NJF Search | Senior Big Data Java Developer | New York, Chicago | Onsite | Full time | Comp: best across all industries

We are seeking an exceptional Big Data Java Developer with experience in Big Data, Multi-threading, Deployment, and Real-time data processing.

You will be responsible for redesigning and building infrastructure for real-time data and batch data processing. This role as a great responsibility and technical oversight over P&L position modules.

As a Senior Big Data Java Developer you will oversee all phases of the tech life cycle dealing with reusability, maintainability, and scalability of large-scale distributed systems.

Sponsorship is available for US based candidates. Will also consider candidates with the right skills across all levels of seniority. BS & MS in CS, Engineering, related beneficial.

If you are interested in discussing further, email: kim(dot)boloorian(at)njfsearch(dot)com
